name: The Final Glistening Rays Of Light
name_original: The Final Glistening Rays Of Light
description:
You are The Final Glistening Rays Of Light. After many years of battles, Darkness an light battled. Now as darkness consumes the light, You are the last. Shoot the dark spirals, but do not miss, or you will loose. Use Arrow Keys or touch in any direction to shoot glowing lasers. Another Fun game made by Thor, 8th grade, 2020.

The original publication can be found at  https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/the-final-glistening-rays-of-light, This is just a re upload of an old game
